parameters.content:
## Daily Check (09:00 JST)

Starts the workflow every morning at 09:00 JST. Adjust schedule/timezone as needed.

## Get Stock Data (Marketstack)
Retrieves the latest EOD prices for the configured ticker. Edit symbol and date range. Keep the limit ‚â• 20 for a stable mean/œÉ.

## Customization Tips

- Monitor multiple tickers: duplicate **Get Stock Data** and merge results.
- Replace Hacker News with **NewsAPI** / **Google News RSS** for broader coverage.
- Switch Slack to **Telegram / Discord / Teams / LINE Messaging API**.
- Add a **Set (Fields)** node to centralize user-configurable variables:
  - `symbol` (ticker), `days` (N), `sigmaK` (k), `newsQuery`, `slackChannel`
- Add an **IF** to translate only when language != JA (cost optimization).

## Price Anomaly Detection & News Alert (Marketstack + HN + DeepL + Slack)

## Overview
This workflow monitors a stock‚Äôs closing price via **Marketstack**. It computes a **20-day moving average** and **standard deviation (¬±2œÉ)**. If the latest close is outside ¬±2œÉ, it flags an **anomaly**, fetches **related headlines from Hacker News**, **translates** them to Japanese with **DeepL**, and **posts both original and translated text to Slack**. When no anomaly is detected, it sends a concise ‚Äúnormal‚Äù report.

## How it works
1) Daily trigger at 09:00 JST  
2) Marketstack: fetch EOD data  
3) Code: compute mean/œÉ and classify (normal/high/low)  
4) IF: anomaly? ‚Üí yes = news path / no = normal report  
5) Hacker News: search related items  
6) DeepL: translate EN ‚Üí JA  
7) Slack: send bilingual notification

## Requirements
- Marketstack API key
- DeepL API key
- Slack OAuth2 (bot token / channel permission)

## Notes
- Edit the ticker in **Get Stock Data**.
- Adjust **N** (days) and **k** (sigma multiplier) in **Calculate Deviation**.
- Keep credentials out of HTTP nodes (use n8n Credentials).

## Calculate Deviation

Computes 20-day mean and standard deviation; classifies the latest close as normal, high (+2œÉ), or low (‚àí2œÉ).

## Is Anomaly? (status != "normal")

Branches to the news path only when the latest close exceeds ¬±2œÉ.

## Get Related News (Hacker News)

Searches articles by the ticker/company keyword. You can switch to NewsAPI/Google RSS.

## Format News (Title + Summary + URL)

Cleans HTML (e.g., <em>) and formats top items for translation/Slack.

## Translate News (EN ‚Üí JA)

DeepL translation to Japanese. Change target_lang if needed.

## Merge Original + Translated

Appends original English and translated Japanese into one message payload.

## Send Alert to Slack (Anomaly)

Sends bilingual alert with stats (latest, mean, œÉ) and related news.
